p: Some of these amoeboids have been shown to be infected by giant double-stranded DNA viruses, identified as members of previously unknown families (Legendre et al. 2014, 2015) and potentially infectious to humans and animals (Tokarz-Deptula et al. 2019). Incidentally, as strange as it may seem, nematodes are also able to survive for thousand years in anabiosis, and have been resurrected from ancient glacier ice (Shatilovich et al. 2018).
